content:
Everyone's had their share of troubles before joining the new Astralink,
Some more than others,
It's perfectly normal to come empty-handed.
Loomi?

I dreamed of ocean waves...
And some strange glowing substance,
All sticky and gross...

The name <color=#97c344>{homestar} Astralink</color> has been officially registered with Loomi Co.
Once the paperwork is approved, it will be announced to other Astralinks.

Time flies so fast...
Is it evening already? Hmm...
Doesn't look like it's getting dark though.

That's what we at Astralink provide - 
water, electricity, gas, internet and more...

You've been in your tent all afternoon.
It's almost evening now,
and since we haven't seen you, we came to check on you.

So the new Astralink supported by Loomi Co.
has a special service...
The <color=#97c344>'Loomi Exchange'</color> event!
These rewards are earned by actively participating in the development of Astralink through daily life activities,\nand are provided by Loomi Co.
Has it been that long?

*cough cough* Just kidding.
By the way...

The Loomi you've earned as rewards
can also be used to pay for housing fees.

<color=#97c344>5000 Loomi</color>!!!
What a great deal~!
I had a dream
Plus the cost of your first-time arrival supply package!

But don't worry,
you don't need to pay rent in cash!

The happier and more active you are in Astralink,
the more Loomi you'll earn,
which can be used to pay your rent.

In other words, the housing fee can be paid with Loomi,
all you need is...

Then I'll take my leave.
Looking forward to working with you!

If it's convenient, I'd like to confirm if this new software
is running properly,
please <color=#97c344>open your phone</color> and check...

This service is Loomi Co.'s way
of encouraging Astralink Residents
to actively help with Astralink's development in their daily lives.

Hmm... I guess...
Being in a new environment,
We need some time to get used to each other, the World Bubble and I...
What's that?

Looks like the new software is running smoothly.
From now on, feel free to join any activity
you like in Loomi Hub.

You can use
<color=#97c344>Loomi</color> instead of cash
to pay for your initial housing fees!

Now then... since you're officially starting your new life here,
<color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>, if it's not too much trouble,
please pay your <color=#97c344>housing fee</color>.

As for how to get Loomi...
<color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>, sign up for this event!
I'll send you the Loomi Exchange software right now.

Thank goodness, <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>,
I'm so relieved you're safe.
